medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began two days prior with sharp and non-radiating pain in the right lower quadrant. The pain becomes dull when lying still. The patient has experienced diarrhea and nausea without vomiting, felt febrile with sweats, continues to have flatus, and reports decreased appetite.
medical_history.past_medical_history: No history of any medical problems. Prior surgeries include patellar tendon surgery and incision & drainage of an infected abdominal stab wound.
medical_history.family_history: Family history includes grandfather with gastric cancer, grandmother with lung cancer, and uncle with throat cancer.
